description: A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. He will be moving into his Uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the beautiful ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?
synonyms: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Scuba Diving
tags.description: Prominently features characters diving with the aid of special breathing equipment.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Tennis
tags.description: Centers around the sport of tennis.

name.native: ロバート・ウォーターマン

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenji_inoue_)

Born in Tokyo, but grew up in Sapporo. He loves Kinoshita Hideyoshi drawn by Yui Haga. Parents and friends around him didn't know anything when his first novel was published. Became famous one day because the supervisor complained that they couldn't understand the Japanese written by Inoue. 

(Source: Baka-Tsuki)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/corporate_x) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/越智博之)

Specializes in mechanical animation. Currently affiliated with [Zero-G](https://anilist.co/studio/6117/).

Attended an art school before joining studio Bevore. Long-time friend of [Naoyuki Onda](https://anilist.co/staff/102427/)'s, who worked with him at the studio. Participated on numerous of AIC's projects in the late '80s and early '90s.

Debuted as a director with [Armitage](https://anilist.co/anime/1079/) in 1995.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B3%B6%E5%B4%8E%E5%A5%88%E3%80%85%E5%AD%90)

Nanako Shimazaki is a director, animator and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenji_inoue_)

Born in Tokyo, but grew up in Sapporo. He loves Kinoshita Hideyoshi drawn by Yui Haga. Parents and friends around him didn't know anything when his first novel was published. Became famous one day because the supervisor complained that they couldn't understand the Japanese written by Inoue. 

(Source: Baka-Tsuki)
